Outline: A female forensic psychiatrist discovers that all of one of her patient's multiple personalities are murder victims. She will have to find out what's happening before her time is finished.

Name: Murder by Numbers
Credit: Dir: Barbet Schroeder With: Sandra Bullock, Ben Chaplin, Ryan Gosling
Outline: Two gifted high school students execute a "perfect" murder - then become engaged in an intellectual contest with a seasoned homicide detective.

Name: Scream 2
Credit: Dir: Wes Craven With: Neve Campbell, Courteney Cox, David Arquette
Outline: Two years after the first series of murders, a new psychopath dons the Ghostface costume and a new string of killings begins.

Name: Men in Black II
Credit: Dir: Barry Sonnenfeld With: Tommy Lee Jones, Will Smith, Rip Torn
Outline: Agent J needs help so he is sent to find Agent K and restore his memory.

Name: Sky Captain and the World of Tomorrow
Credit: Dir: Kerry Conran With: Gwyneth Paltrow, Jude Law, Angelina Jolie
Outline: After New York City receives a series of attacks from giant flying robots, a reporter teams up with a pilot in search of their origin, as well as the reason for the disappearances of famous scientists around the world.

Name: Birth
Credit: Dir: Jonathan Glazer With: Nicole Kidman, Cameron Bright, Lauren Bacall
Outline: A young boy attempts to convince a woman that he is her dead husband reborn.

Name: Transporter 3
Credit: Dir: Olivier Megaton With: Jason Statham, Robert Knepper, Natalya Rudakova
Outline: Frank Martin puts the driving gloves on to deliver Valentina, the kidnapped daughter of a Ukranian government official, from Marseilles to Odessa on the Black Sea. En route, he has to contend with thugs who want to intercept Valentina's safe delivery and not let his personal feelings get in the way of his dangerous objective.

Name: Dragonfly
Credit: Dir: Tom Shadyac With: Kevin Costner, Susanna Thompson, Joe Morton
Outline: A grieving doctor is being contacted by his late wife through his patients near death experiences.

Name: Eraser
Credit: Dir: Chuck Russell With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Vanessa Williams, James Caan
Outline: A Witness Protection specialist becomes suspicious of his co-workers when dealing with a case involving high-tech weapons.

Name: Friday the 13th Part 2
Credit: Dir: Steve Miner With: Betsy Palmer, Amy Steel, John Furey
Outline: Mrs. Voorhees is dead, and Camp Crystal Lake is shut down, but a camp next to the infamous place is stalked by an unknown assailant. Is it Mrs. Voorhees' son Jason, who did not really drown in the lake some 30 years before?

Name: Deception
Credit: Dir: Marcel Langenegger With: Hugh Jackman, Ewan McGregor, Michelle Williams
Outline: An accountant is introduced to a mysterious sex club known as The List by his lawyer friend. But in this new world, he soon becomes the prime suspect in a woman's disappearance and a multi-million dollar heist.

Name: Saw VI
Credit: Dir: Kevin Greutert With: Tobin Bell, Costas Mandylor, Mark Rolston
Outline: Agent Strahm is dead, and FBI agent Erickson draws nearer to Hoffman. Meanwhile, a pair of insurance executives find themselves in another game set by jigsaw.

Name: Sphere
Credit: Dir: Barry Levinson With: Dustin Hoffman, Sharon Stone, Samuel L. Jackson
Outline: A spaceship is discovered under three hundred years' worth of coral growth at the bottom of the ocean.

Name: Van Helsing
Credit: Dir: Stephen Sommers With: Hugh Jackman, Kate Beckinsale, Richard Roxburgh
Outline: The notorious monster hunter is sent to Transylvania to stop Count Dracula who is using Dr. Frankenstein's research and a werewolf for some sinister purpose.

Name: Original Sin
Credit: Dir: Michael Cristofer With: Antonio Banderas, Angelina Jolie, Thomas Jane
Outline: A woman along with her lover, plan to con a rich man by marrying him and on earning his trust running away with all his money. Everything goes as planned until she actually begins to fall in love with him.

Name: Righteous Kill
Credit: Dir: Jon Avnet With: Robert De Niro, Al Pacino, Carla Gugino
Outline: Two veteran New York City detectives work on a case of serial executions of criminals who escaped justice.

Name: The Rite
Credit: Dir: Mikael HÃ¥fstrÃ¶m With: Colin O'Donoghue, Anthony Hopkins, CiarÃ¡n Hinds
Outline: An American seminary student travels to Italy to take an exorcism course.

Name: Cannibal Holocaust
Credit: Dir: Ruggero Deodato With: Robert Kerman, Francesca Ciardi, Perry Pirkanen
Outline: During a rescue mission into the amazon rain forest, a professor stumbles across lost film shot by a missing documentary crew.

Name: The Amityville Horror
Credit: Dir: Andrew Douglas With: Ryan Reynolds, Melissa George, Jimmy Bennett
Outline: Newlyweds are terrorized by demonic forces after moving into a large house that was the site of a grisly mass murder a year before.

Name: The Mortal Instruments: City of Bones
Credit: Dir: Harald Zwart With: Lily Collins, Jamie Campbell Bower, Robert Sheehan
Outline: When her mother disappears, Clary Fray learns that she descends from a line of warriors who protect our world from demons. She joins forces with others like her and heads into a dangerous alternate New York called the Shadow World.

Name: The Tall Man
Credit: Dir: Pascal Laugier With: Jessica Biel, Jodelle Ferland, William B. Davis
Outline: When her child goes missing, a mother looks to unravel the legend of the Tall Man, an entity who allegedly abducts children.

Name: Dream House
Credit: Dir: Jim Sheridan With: Daniel Craig, Rachel Weisz, Naomi Watts
Outline: Soon after moving into their seemingly idyllic new home, a family learns of a brutal crime committed against former residents of the dwelling.

Name: The Fourth Kind
Credit: Dir: Olatunde Osunsanmi With: Milla Jovovich, Elias Koteas, Will Patton
Outline: A thriller involving an ongoing unsolved mystery in Alaska, where one town has seen an extraordinary number of unexplained disappearances during the past 40 years and there are accusations of a federal cover up.

Name: After.Life
Credit: Dir: Agnieszka Wojtowicz-Vosloo With: Christina Ricci, Liam Neeson, Justin Long
Outline: A young woman caught between life and death... and a funeral director who appears to have the gift of transitioning the dead, but might just be intent on burying her alive.

Name: Snake Eyes
Credit: Dir: Brian De Palma With: Nicolas Cage, Gary Sinise, John Heard
Outline: A shady police detective finds himself in the middle of a murder conspiracy at an important boxing match in an Atlantic City casino.

Name: Gone
Credit: Dir: Heitor Dhalia With: Amanda Seyfried, Jennifer Carpenter, Wes Bentley
Outline: A woman is convinced her kidnapper has returned when her sister goes missing.

Name: 88 Minutes
Credit: Dir: Jon Avnet With: Al Pacino, Alicia Witt, Ben McKenzie
Outline: On the day that a serial killer that he helped put away is supposed to be executed, a noted forensic psychologist and college professor receives a call informing him that he has 88 minutes left to live.

Name: The X Files: I Want to Believe
Credit: Dir: Chris Carter With: David Duchovny, Gillian Anderson, Billy Connolly
Outline: Mulder and Scully are called back to duty by the FBI when a former priest claims to be receiving psychic visions pertaining to a kidnapped agent.

Name: Saw IV
Credit: Dir: Darren Lynn Bousman With: Tobin Bell, Scott Patterson, Costas Mandylor
Outline: Despite Jigsaw's death, and in order to save the lives of two of his colleagues, Lieutenant Rigg is forced to take part in a new game, which promises to test him to the limit.

Name: The Haunting in Connecticut
Credit: Dir: Peter Cornwell With: Virginia Madsen, Martin Donovan, Elias Koteas
Outline: After a family is forced to relocate for their son's health, they begin experiencing supernatural behavior in their new home, and uncover a sinister history.

Name: Without a Paddle
Credit: Dir: Steven Brill With: Matthew Lillard, Seth Green, Dax Shepard
Outline: After their friend dies, three men decide to fulfill their childhood promise by going on a camping expedition for the lost D.B. Cooper bounty, with calamitous results.

Name: Hide and Seek
Credit: Dir: John Polson With: Robert De Niro, Dakota Fanning, Famke Janssen
Outline: As a widower tries to piece together his life in the wake of his wife's suicide, his daughter finds solace -- at first -- in her imaginary friend.

Name: The 6th Day
Credit: Dir: Roger Spottiswoode With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Michael Rapaport, Tony Goldwyn
Outline: Futuristic action about a man who meets a clone of himself and stumbles into a grand conspiracy about clones taking over the world.

Name: Premonition
Credit: Dir: Mennan Yapo With: Sandra Bullock, Julian McMahon, Amber Valletta
Outline: Depressed housewife learns her husband was killed in a car accident the day previously, awakens the next morning to find him alive and well at home, and then awakens the next day after to a world in which he is still dead.

Name: The Golden Child
Credit: Dir: Michael Ritchie With: Eddie Murphy, J.L. Reate, Charles Dance
Outline: A private detective specializing in missing children is charged with the task of finding a special child who dark forces want to eliminate.

Name: The Grudge
Credit: Dir: Takashi Shimizu With: Sarah Michelle Gellar, Jason Behr, Clea DuVall
Outline: An American nurse living and working in Tokyo is exposed to a mysterious supernatural curse, one that locks a person in a powerful rage before claiming their life and spreading to another victim.

Name: Passengers
Credit: Dir: Rodrigo GarcÃ­a With: Anne Hathaway, Patrick Wilson, David Morse
Outline: A grief counselor working with a group of plane-crash survivors finds herself at the root of a mystery when her clients begin to disappear.

Name: The Net
Credit: Dir: Irwin Winkler With: Sandra Bullock, Jeremy Northam, Dennis Miller
Outline: A computer programmer stumbles upon a conspiracy, putting her life and the lives of those around her in great danger.

Name: Gothika
Credit: Dir: Mathieu Kassovitz With: Halle Berry, PenÃ©lope Cruz, Robert Downey Jr.
Outline: A repressed female psychiatrist wakes up as a patient in the asylum where she worked, with no memory of why she is there or what she has done.

Name: Saw V
Credit: Dir: David Hackl With: Scott Patterson, Costas Mandylor, Tobin Bell
Outline: Following Jigsaw's grisly demise, Mark Hoffman is commended as a hero, but Agent Strahm is suspicious, and delves into Hoffman's past. Meanwhile, another group of strangers are put through a series of gruesome tests.

Name: The Gunman
Credit: Dir: Pierre Morel With: Sean Penn, Idris Elba, Jasmine Trinca
Outline: A sniper on a mercenary assassination team, kills the minister of mines of the Congo. Terrier's successful kill shot forces him into hiding. Returning to the Congo years later, he becomes the target of a hit squad himself.

Name: The Forgotten
Credit: Dir: Joseph Ruben With: Julianne Moore, Dominic West, Christopher Kovaleski
Outline: After being told that their children never existed, a man and woman soon discover there is a much bigger enemy at work.

Name: Striking Distance
Credit: Dir: Rowdy Herrington With: Bruce Willis, Sarah Jessica Parker, Dennis Farina
Outline: Coming from a police family, Tom Hardy ends up fighting his uncle after the murder of his father. Tom believes the killer is another cop, and goes on the record with his allegations. Demoted then to river duty, the killer taunts Tom.

Name: Oldboy
Credit: Dir: Spike Lee With: Josh Brolin, Elizabeth Olsen, Samuel L. Jackson
Outline: Obsessed with vengeance, a man sets out to find out why he was kidnapped and locked into solitary confinement for twenty years without reason.

Name: Cube Zero
Credit: Dir: Ernie Barbarash With: Zachary Bennett, Stephanie Moore, Martin Roach
Outline: A young man whose job is to watch over the Cube endeavours to rescue an innocent woman trapped in one of its rooms.

Name: Unfriended
Credit: Dir: Levan Gabriadze With: Heather Sossaman, Matthew Bohrer, Courtney Halverson
Outline: A group of online chat room friends find themselves haunted by a mysterious, supernatural force using the account of their dead friend.

Name: End of Days
Credit: Dir: Peter Hyams With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Gabriel Byrne, Robin Tunney
Outline: At the end of the century, Satan visits New York in search of a bride. It's up to an ex-cop who now runs an elite security outfit to stop him.

Name: Perfect Stranger
Credit: Dir: James Foley With: Halle Berry, Bruce Willis, Giovanni Ribisi
Outline: A journalist goes undercover to ferret out businessman Harrison Hill as her childhood friend's killer. Posing as one of his temps, she enters into a game of online cat-and-mouse.

Name: Lady in the Water
Credit: Dir: M. Night Shyamalan With: Paul Giamatti, Bryce Dallas Howard, Jeffrey Wright
Outline: Apartment building superintendent Cleveland Heep rescues what he thinks is a young woman from the pool he maintains. When he discovers that she is actually a character from a bedtime story who is trying to make the journey back to her home, he works with his tenants to protect his new friend from the creatures that are determined to keep her in our world.

Name: Saw 3D: The Final Chapter
Credit: Dir: Kevin Greutert With: Tobin Bell, Costas Mandylor, Betsy Russell
Outline: As a deadly battle rages over Jigsaw's brutal legacy, a group of Jigsaw survivors gathers to seek the support of self-help guru and fellow survivor Bobby Dagen, a man whose own dark secrets unleash a new wave of terror.

Name: I Know What You Did Last Summer
Credit: Dir: Jim Gillespie With: Jennifer Love Hewitt, Sarah Michelle Gellar, Anne Heche
Outline: Four teens are in great danger one year after their car hits a stranger whose body they dump in the sea.

Name: House at the End of the Street
Credit: Dir: Mark Tonderai With: Jennifer Lawrence, Elisabeth Shue, Max Thieriot
Outline: After moving with her mother to a small town, a teenager finds that an accident happened in the house at the end of the street. Things get more complicated when she befriends a boy who was the only survivor of the accident.

Name: The Pink Panther
Credit: Dir: Shawn Levy With: Steve Martin, Kevin Kline, Jean Reno
Outline: Bumbling Inspector Clouseau must solve the murder of a famous soccer coach and find out who stole the infamous Pink Panther diamond.

Name: The Black Dahlia
Credit: Dir: Brian De Palma With: Josh Hartnett, Aaron Eckhart, Scarlett Johansson
Outline: Two policemen see their personal and professional lives fall apart in the wake of the "Black Dahlia" murder investigation.

Name: House on Haunted Hill
Credit: Dir: William Malone With: Geoffrey Rush, Famke Janssen, Taye Diggs
Outline: A millionaire offers a group of diverse people $1,000,000 to spend the night in a haunted house with a horrifying past.

Name: Vampire Academy
Credit: Dir: Mark Waters With: Zoey Deutch, Lucy Fry, Danila Kozlovsky
Outline: Rose Hathaway is a Dhampir, half human-half vampire, a guardian of the Moroi, peaceful, mortal vampires living discreetly within our world. Her calling is to protect the Moroi from bloodthirsty, immortal Vampires, the Strigoi.

Name: The Box
Credit: Dir: Richard Kelly With: Cameron Diaz, James Marsden, Frank Langella
Outline: A small wooden box arrives on the doorstep of a married couple, who know that opening it will grant them a million dollars and kill someone they don't know.

Name: The Pink Panther 2
Credit: Dir: Harald Zwart With: Steve Martin, Jean Reno, Emily Mortimer
Outline: Insp. Jacques Clouseau teams up with a squad of International detectives who are just as bumbling as he is. Their mission: Stop a globe-trotting thief who specializes in stealing historical artifacts.

Name: The Omen
Credit: Dir: John Moore With: Liev Schreiber, Julia Stiles, Seamus Davey-Fitzpatrick
Outline: A remake of the horror classic The Omen , an American official realizes that his young son may literally be the devil incarnate.

Name: Mortdecai
Credit: Dir: David Koepp With: Johnny Depp, Gwyneth Paltrow, Ewan McGregor
Outline: Juggling angry Russians, the British Mi5, and an international terrorist, debonair art dealer and part time rogue Charlie Mortdecai races to recover a stolen painting rumored to contain a code that leads to lost Nazi gold.

Name: Scream 3
Credit: Dir: Wes Craven With: David Arquette, Neve Campbell, Courteney Cox
Outline: While Sidney and her friends visit the Hollywood set of Stab 3, the third film based on the Woodsboro murders, a new Ghostface begins to terrorize them once again.

Name: Whiteout
Credit: Dir: Dominic Sena With: Kate Beckinsale, Gabriel Macht, Tom Skerritt
Outline: U.S. Marshal Carrie Stetko tracks a killer in Antarctica, as the sun is about to set for six months.

Name: Southland Tales
Credit: Dir: Richard Kelly With: Dwayne Johnson, Sarah Michelle Gellar, Seann William Scott
Outline: During a three day heat wave just before a huge 4th of July celebration, an action star stricken with amnesia meets up with a porn star who is developing her own reality TV project, and a policeman who holds the key to a vast conspiracy.

Name: Dude, Where's My Car?
Credit: Dir: Danny Leiner With: Ashton Kutcher, Seann William Scott, Jennifer Garner
Outline: Two potheads wake up after a night of partying and cannot remember where they parked their car.

Name: White Noise
Credit: Dir: Geoffrey Sax With: Michael Keaton, Deborah Kara Unger, Ian McNeice
Outline: An architect's desire to speak with his wife from beyond the grave, becomes an obsession with supernatural repercussions.

Name: Urban Legend
Credit: Dir: Jamie Blanks With: Jared Leto, Alicia Witt, Rebecca Gayheart
Outline: A college student suspects a series of bizarre deaths are connected to certain urban legends.

Name: Red Riding Hood
Credit: Dir: Catherine Hardwicke With: Amanda Seyfried, Lukas Haas, Gary Oldman
Outline: Set in a medieval village that is haunted by a werewolf, a young girl falls for an orphaned woodcutter, much to her family's displeasure.

Name: Annabelle
Credit: Dir: John R. Leonetti With: Ward Horton, Annabelle Wallis, Alfre Woodard
Outline: A couple begins to experience terrifying supernatural occurrences involving a vintage doll shortly after their home is invaded by satanic cultists.

Name: Blackhat
Credit: Dir: Michael Mann With: Chris Hemsworth, Viola Davis, Wei Tang
Outline: A furloughed convict and his American and Chinese partners hunt a high-level cybercrime network from Chicago to Los Angeles to Hong Kong to Jakarta.

Name: Max Payne
Credit: Dir: John Moore With: Mark Wahlberg, Mila Kunis, Beau Bridges
Outline: Coming together to solve a series of murders in New York City are a police detective whose family was slain as part of a conspiracy and an assassin out to avenge her sister's death. The duo will be hunted by the police, the mob, and a ruthless corporation.

Name: The Eye
Credit: Dir: David Moreau, Xavier Palud With: Jessica Alba, Alessandro Nivola, Parker Posey
Outline: A woman receives an eye transplant that allows her to see into the supernatural world.

Name: The Ring Two
Credit: Dir: Hideo Nakata With: Naomi Watts, David Dorfman, Sissy Spacek
Outline: Six months after the incidents involving the lethal videotape, new clues prove that there is a new evil lurking in the darkness.

Name: Turistas
Credit: Dir: John Stockwell With: Josh Duhamel, Melissa George, Olivia Wilde
Outline: A group of young backpackers' vacation turns sour when a bus accident leaves them marooned in a remote Brazilian rural area that holds an ominous secret.

Name: A Serbian Film
Credit: Dir: Srdjan Spasojevic With: Srdjan Todorovic, Sergej Trifunovic, Jelena Gavrilovic
Outline: An aging porn star agrees to participate in an "art film" in order to make a clean break from the business, only to discover that he has been drafted into making a pedophilia and necrophilia themed snuff film.

Name: A Nightmare on Elm Street
Credit: Dir: Samuel Bayer With: Jackie Earle Haley, Rooney Mara, Kyle Gallner
Outline: The spectre of a dead child rapist haunts the children of the parents who murdered him, stalking and killing them in their dreams.

Name: Shutter
Credit: Dir: Masayuki Ochiai With: Joshua Jackson, Rachael Taylor, James Kyson
Outline: A newly married couple discovers disturbing, ghostly images in photographs they develop after a tragic accident. Fearing the manifestations may be connected, they investigate and learn that some mysteries are better left unsolved.

Name: Apollo 18
Credit: Dir: Gonzalo LÃ³pez-Gallego With: Warren Christie, Lloyd Owen, Ryan Robbins
Outline: Decades-old found footage from NASA's abandoned Apollo 18 mission, where two American astronauts were sent on a secret expedition, reveals the reason the U.S. has never returned to the moon.

Name: Exorcist: The Beginning
Credit: Dir: Renny Harlin With: Stellan SkarsgÃ¥rd, Izabella Scorupco, James D'Arcy
Outline: Years before Father Lancaster Merrin helped save Regan MacNeil's soul, he first encounters the demon Pazuzu in East Africa. This is the tale of Father Merrin's initial battle with Pazuzu and the rediscovery of his faith.

Name: Alex Cross
Credit: Dir: Rob Cohen With: Tyler Perry, Matthew Fox, Rachel Nichols
Outline: A homicide detective is pushed to the brink of his moral and physical limits as he tangles with a ferociously skilled serial killer who specializes in torture and pain.

Name: Silent Hill: Revelation 3D
Credit: Dir: Michael J. Bassett With: Adelaide Clemens, Kit Harington, Sean Bean
Outline: When her father disappears, Heather Mason is drawn into a strange and terrifying alternate reality that holds answers to the horrific nightmares that have plagued her since childhood.

Name: Abduction
Credit: Dir: John Singleton With: Taylor Lautner, Lily Collins, Alfred Molina
Outline: A thriller centered on a young man who sets out to uncover the truth about his life after finding his baby photo on a missing persons website.

Name: Congo
Credit: Dir: Frank Marshall With: Laura Linney, Tim Curry, Dylan Walsh
Outline: When an expedition to the African Congo ends in disaster, a new team is assembled to find out what went wrong.

Name: Chernobyl Diaries
Credit: Dir: Bradley Parker With: Jesse McCartney, Jonathan Sadowski, Olivia Taylor Dudley
Outline: Six tourists hire an extreme tour guide who takes them to the abandoned city Pripyat, the former home to the workers of the Chernobyl nuclear reactor. During their exploration, they soon discover they are not alone.

Name: Scooby-Doo 2: Monsters Unleashed
Genre: Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Horror | Mystery
Credit: Dir: Raja Gosnell With: Freddie Prinze Jr., Sarah Michelle Gellar, Matthew Lillard
Outline: Mystery Inc. must save Coolsville from an attack of past unmasked monsters brought to life by an evil masked figure trying to "unmask" the gang.

Name: Darkness Falls
Credit: Dir: Jonathan Liebesman With: Chaney Kley, Emma Caulfield, Antony Burrows
Outline: A vengeful spirit has taken the form of the Tooth Fairy to exact vengeance on the town that lynched her 150 years earlier. Her only opposition is the only child, now grown up, who has survived her before.

Name: Scooby-Doo
Credit: Dir: Raja Gosnell With: Matthew Lillard, Freddie Prinze Jr., Sarah Michelle Gellar
Outline: After an acrimonious break up, the Mystery Inc. gang are individually brought to an island resort to investigate strange goings on.

Name: The Haunted Mansion
Credit: Dir: Rob Minkoff With: Eddie Murphy, Marsha Thomason, Jennifer Tilly
Outline: A realtor and his wife and children are summoned to a mansion, which they soon discover is haunted, and while they attempt to escape, he learns an important lesson about the family he has neglected.

Name: The Haunting
Credit: Dir: Jan de Bont With: Liam Neeson, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Owen Wilson
Outline: When Eleanor, Theo, and Luke decide to take part in a sleep study at a huge mansion they get more than they bargained for when Dr. Marrow tells them of the house's ghostly past.

Name: The Unborn
Credit: Dir: David S. Goyer With: Odette Annable, Gary Oldman, Cam Gigandet
Outline: A young woman fights the spirit that is slowly taking possession of her.

Name: The Boy Next Door
Credit: Dir: Rob Cohen With: Jennifer Lopez, Ryan Guzman, Kristin Chenoweth
Outline: A recently cheated on married woman falls for a younger man who has moved in next door, but their torrid affair soon takes a dangerous turn.

Name: Psycho
Credit: Dir: Gus Van Sant With: Vince Vaughn, Anne Heche, Julianne Moore
Outline: A young female embezzeler arrives at the Bates Motel which has terrible secrets of its own.

Name: I Still Know What You Did Last Summer
Credit: Dir: Danny Cannon With: Jennifer Love Hewitt, Freddie Prinze Jr., Brandy Norwood
Outline: The murderous fisherman with a hook is back to once again stalk the two surviving teens, Julie and Ray, who left him for dead, as well as cause even more murder and mayhem, this time at a posh island resort.

Name: Basic Instinct 2
Credit: Dir: Michael Caton-Jones With: Sharon Stone, David Morrissey, David Thewlis
Outline: Novelist Catherine Tramell is once again in trouble with the law, and Scotland Yard appoints psychiatrist Dr. Michael Glass to evaluate her. Though, like Detective Nick Curran before him, Glass is entranced by Tramell and lured into a seductive game.

Name: Boogeyman
Credit: Dir: Stephen Kay With: Barry Watson, Emily Deschanel, Lucy Lawless
Outline: A young man tries to deal with the childhood terror that has affected his life.

Name: Book of Shadows: Blair Witch 2
Credit: Dir: Joe Berlinger With: Jeffrey Donovan, Stephen Barker Turner, Erica Leerhsen
Outline: A group of tourists arrive in Burkittsville, Maryland after seeing "The Blair Witch Project" to explore the mythology and phenomenon, only to come face to face with their own neuroses and possibly the witch herself.

Name: One Missed Call
Credit: Dir: Eric Valette With: Edward Burns, Shannyn Sossamon, Ana Claudia TalancÃ³n
Outline: Several people start receiving voice-mails from their future selves - messages which include the date, time, and some of the details of their deaths.

Name: Prom Night
Credit: Dir: Nelson McCormick With: Brittany Snow, Scott Porter, Jessica Stroup
Outline: Donna's senior prom is supposed to be the best night of her life, though a sadistic killer from her past has different plans for her and her friends.

Name: The Wicker Man
Credit: Dir: Neil LaBute With: Nicolas Cage, Ellen Burstyn, Leelee Sobieski
Outline: A sheriff investigating the disappearance of a young girl from a small island discovers there's a larger mystery to solve among the island's secretive, neo-pagan community.
